evidence.claim: Population Health Alliance utilizes HL7 and FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
The organization mentions adherence to HIPAA regulations in their data handling practices.
Population Health Alliance collaborates with clearinghouses for EDI transactions including X12.
They emphasize integration of health information systems through established healthcare data standards.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction activity found on public pages.
